qas.question: What was very important to the polish nobility?
What kind of system was the coats of arms?
how did the polish nobility system compare to other heraldy countries?

context: <a0_0>Coats of arms<a0_0/> were very important to the Polish nobility. Its <a1_0>heraldic system<a1_0/> evolved together with its neighbours in Central Europe, while <a2_0>differing in many ways<a2_0/> from the heraldry of other European countries. Polish knighthood families had its counterparts, links or roots in <a3_0>Moravia (i.e. Poraj) and Germany<a3_0/> (i.e. Junosza).
